data.title: Best barbecue
data.text:
Excellent food. Can't say enough about the quality. Best barbecue in town. This is a MUST visit in Decatur.
Mama T rocks, great service.

data.title: Great wings!
data.text: Stopped by for a cold brewski and some delicious wings! Had a great time. & the wings were only .50 cents Thanks so much Momma T.!

data.title: Best stuffed potatoes!!!
data.text:
I love the stuffed potatoes they have.   Best ones I have ever had!!!!!
The dining environment and the music is great!  The staff are always smiling and helpful!!!

data.title: Great food, friendly staff
data.text: We stopped in after a long day of shopping. The staff was very helpful and friendly. The pork, turkey and cole slaw were excellent. The food was so much better than the chain restaurants! We will be back again. Thank you!!

data.title: Best Barbecue Ever
data.text: So good!  Awesome food!  Had the barbecue turkey and pork, slaw, baked beans and cornbread. Delicious!  Great Southern Hospitality!  Definitely recommend!

data.title: Awesome Food!
data.text: Smoked chicken and Alabama Egg Rolls are amazing! The ownership and staff are great and always friendly!

data.title: Mr. Kerry Meadows
data.text: Excellent great food great price conveniently located in downtown Decatur Alabama good portion sizes

data.title: Thoroughly enjoyed our meal!!
data.text: My husband and I recently ate at Moe's BBQ in Decatur and we thoroughly enjoyed our selections.  My husband had their catfish with Moe's signature tartar sauce.  It was cooked exactly right with the crust being light and crispy while the inside was white and flaky.  He chose sides of potato salad and banana pudding - and he was extremely pleased with both.  I had the smoked turkey-topped potato and it was absolutely wonderful.  You get plenty of value when you order Moe's potatoes - I was able to get 3 meals from this one potato!  Even though it was a large potato, it was baked through and through.  The turkey was absolutely delicious with the smoked flavor being spot-on.  They top this with cheese, bacon bits, and their own white sauce - which absolutely brings the whole thing together into one perfect meal.  At other times we've had their redneck nachos, Thanksgiving sandwich, beef brisket and everyone should try their Alabama egg rolls at least one their lifetime!  I can honestly say we have never had a bad meal at Moe's and we're looking forward to our next visit.

data.title: NOW JUST A NAME! Brand is lost!
data.text: While Moe's started out with a fantastic product, today its just a name, sadly. I say this because one of their signature items, the SMOKED WINGS, have both gone up in price and the quality has... No!... even more so.. are not even what they were before!! Even the grilled cornbread comes in frozen and is never warm and only one side is toasted now...this is true for all the stores!!  The Smoked Wings actually used to look "Smoked"....with a reddish brown, "crispish" skin, needing nothing but your taste buds! So 2 weeks ago I visit the store in Decatur, order wings...now 12 bucks instead of 10! They had no green vegetables to serve, the wings were more "white" than "smoked" looking and the chef took it upon himself to now serve every batch of wings drizzled in "ughhh" Hot Sauce!!  I couldn't even eat them as they were not anything close to the original Product introduced to this area a few years ago. Sure the space is Primo!! Outdoor area for lounging and chilling, TV's everywhere!! But just know that what you may eat today, may not be what you eat next month! Great place to have a beer though!

owner_response.author: Rthelsley, Owner at Moe's Original Bar B Que, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
MadTrav,
We would first like to apologize for you experience at our Decatur location. We have recently made some changes with the store being under new management. We continue to address certain issues and menu pricing is definately one on our "to-do list." We can assure you that our cornbread never comes close to a freezer. Yes, we only grill one side of the cornbread. That is how it is supposed to be. It's a texture thing. Soft from the bottom with a little more bite on top from being browned on the griddle. Our wings, are smoked then fried and always lightly tossed in our house made wing sauce unless specially ordered. All of our meats and sides are prepared fresh daily. Since we do operate on a first come first served basis, this may explain why we may have been out of a green vegetable for that particular time of day. Anyways, We do appreciate your feedback and hope that you will give us another shot in the future.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Potato Salad
data.text: Shrimp were good and the sweet potato casserole yet the potato salad was to die for. This was my first time ever visiting and the staff was gr8t.

data.title: Memorable Family Meal
data.text:
We've enjoyed Moe's at Panama City Beach. So we were delighted to have a chance to try Moe's in Decatur. The barbecue is the best, as one would expect, but the sides are as good as I've eaten anywhere. All homemade recipes made fresh daily. I recommend mashed potatoes, squash casserole, and collard greens. Friendly service, great ambience.
 
 .

data.title: Our 1st Trip
data.text: I taken my 2 kids for supper.  They got the pork sandwiches with chips and drink and I got the pulled pork platter with skillet corn, red beans and rice, and drink.  Food was hot, fresh, and great tasting.  Atmosphere was good and service was really good.

data.title: Friendliest people ever
data.text: Showed up here solo on a business trip. Sat at the bar and ordered some food. Most delicious ribs ever. Met some great people.

data.title: Great food, fun atmosphere
data.text: Each time I have eaten at Moe's the food has been excellent.  I appreciate the courteous service, too. My favorites are the redneck nachos, smoked turkey, catfish with hushpuppies, skillet corn, and the coconut pie. The live music has provided entertainment for an enjoyable dining experience.  This has truly become my favorite restaurant in Decatur!

data.title: Bike ride
data.text: Took a bike ride and stopped in for lunch. The nachos were really good! Good service and great bushwhackers! We really liked the atmosphere with live music .

data.title: Saturday bike ride
data.text: Went to Decatur for a Harley bike ride. Stopped in at Moe's and was pleasantly surprised. Greeted by a smiling and very informative cashier. Received our food in a timely fashion. The food was delicious! The a staff was wonderful. Parking for our motorcycles was directly outside. We will be back!

data.title: Chicken not done
data.text: We at at Moe's barbecue last month and it was delicious. My wife had the chicken and it would melt in your mouth. Today we went back. I had the pork and it was good. She got the chicken again but this time it was under-cooked. We told them about it and they said it looked ok to them. My wife brought the chicken home and had to cook it in the oven. The potato salad and green beans were good .

owner_response.author: Rthelsley, Owner at Moe's Original Bar B Que, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We appreciate you stopping in to check us out and also for taking the time to review us. Customer feedback is very important for us as we strive to grow. We apologize for your latest dining experience. However, we do check the temperature on all of our meats before we remove them from our smoker to ensure that we are not serving undercooked food to our guests. From our smoking process, our meats, especially the poultry reveals a pinkish color referred to as the smoke ring. This sometimes makes the chicken appear to be less than fully cooked. We hope you guys will come back and visit us again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great BBQ joint
data.text: Great food, great atmosphere, great people, we had a great overall experience. Beer selection was sub-par good draft selection

data.title: Always Good
data.text: Food is always good. Fairly good stocked bar and fun atmosphere. It is a popular place for the locals.

data.title: Great food, great price!
data.text: Love the atmosphere and the friendly staff! The food is amazing and the price is great. All of the southern side choices are delicious, too!
